case.state: Noelle and Sucrose? And... are you from Liyue, miss? To think that so many residents of Teyvat would come here...
Oh my... Noelle and Sucrose? I had heard this place attracted visitors from many worlds, but to encounter two of my own friends...
Ta-da! Ehehe, Barb-- W-Wait, Sucrose? I never thought I'd meet you at a place like this...
Thank you, Barbatos, for guiding me-- Oh, Noelle? I didn't know you were here.
Coming from Mondstadt and-- Hmm? Do you hail from Teyvat as well, Miss...?
Thank you, Barbatos, for looking after me on my journey to the Inventory.
A place where people strip after playing with cards... t-this could be a form of freedom as well.
Coming from Mondstadt and spreading joy; I will give mirth to all girls and boys!
Ta-da! Ehehe, Barbara is here!
Sucrose too? Did the two of you come here together, by any chance?
Oh, and Noelle too? I never expected to meet the two of you at a place like this... But I'm happy all the same.
S-Sucrose? I never imagined I would see you here... In fact, I hardly ever see you outside of your lab!
Oh, Noelle? Have you come here to help out around here?
Hmm? You're from... Liyue, aren't you? I recognize that style of clothing...
Oh my, so many holy women here tonight... I-I suppose we all have a little bit of sin inside of us.
Well, I'm happy you've joined us regardless. Maybe this will help you break out of your shell?
Oh? You're actually here to play? Then... let's do our best to give ~player~ a rousing show together!
Oh? You're actually here to play? Then... let's do our best to give everyone a rousing show together!
Eh? The Wangsheng Funeral Parlor...? I hope nothing terrible has happened here!
May the Anemo Archon bless us all.
Should anyone need to be comforted along the way, don't hesitate to let me know!
Eventually, all but one of us will be wearing nothing... is that true freedom? There's only one way to find out!
Now, without further ado... Let the show begin!
~Cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~? Why yes, I'll take them!
May I trade these ~cards.text~?
I would like ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, Dealer.
Bless the next ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~...
I'll exchange ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~. Barbatos, guide my hand...
I'll take ~cards.text~. That sounds right
Can I trade these ~cards.text~? Pretty please?
That's it! I need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ right now!
Barbatos above, I could really use ~cards.text~ right now...
I can't heal myself, but ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ might keep me in the fight...
A loss right now might not hurt, but... ~cards.text~?
I'd like to watch the show a little longer. ~Cards.text~, please?
Thank you, Barbatos!
No need to recover after this round!
May the same joy of freedom grace you all as well...
â™« La, da da da da, da da da da, da, da~ â™«
I hope you all get great cards just like I did!
One of us will lose, but there's no need to be upset! I'll cheer you on the whole way through!
Do any of you have a sight you never tire of? Personally, I could never get bored of Mondstadt's beautiful nature.
It's moments like this that allow me to always stay positive!
I prayed to Barbatos for good fortune today. I'd like to believe that he heard my call.
We all have something that keeps us going. For me, it's the smiles on the faces of those I've helped.
Go, Barbara, go!
After this, I'd like to have some spicy squid at the Good Hunter. You all are free to join me, of course!
The Archon of Mondstadt, Barbatos, is quite hands-off. That's because he trusts us to make the most of our freedom.
If it were up to me, we would all be winners! But if one of us has to lose, I don't think it will be me.
Hehe... the Archons smiled upon me this time.
These ought to prevent me from losing anymore.
It's a shame I can't heal my outfit, but I won't be losing anything this time.
â™« La la la, ha ha ha â™«
Yay! That astrologist's prediction came true! I really am having good luck!
Every day, I hope to prove myself worthy of the Vision that Barbatos blessed me with.
Would anybody like some spicy dried fish? I keep some in my bag just for occasions like this!
A true idol should always try to heal the soul of the people.
I'm so happy, I could burst into song~
Every time I make somebody smile, I feel like I'm getting closer to my dream.
Others sometimes ask me how I keep such a lithe form... but that's an idol's secret.
I love the praise I get from all of my fans, but sometimes I have to wonder where they come up with such heartwarming compliments...
I won't stop until I've healed every person in Mondstadt -- no, in all of Teyvat!
Is this a healing experience for you all? It would explain why there are so many people in this place.
I'll win this one! Not just for my fans - for myself, too!
I need to... I want to have some confidence in myself.
We've all already come this far. I'm not letting anybody give up now, alright?
My positivity hasn't failed me so far! ...Er, except for all the losses...
I don't need Barbatos's help right now. I can do it all on my own.
No matter what happens, thank you all for the game. I've experienced freedom that not even Mondstadt could afford.
There's more than one kind of happiness I can bring a person here, isn't there...?
Some Archons might look less positively on this game. Thank goodness Barbatos doesn't care.
Every new adventure brings a new experience for me.
Clothes get torn apart easily on the battlefield. That's not a bad thing if you're interested in what's underneath them, though...
If I've made the rest of you happy, surely you can make me happy in return?
Some say an idol has to be pure. Perhaps we're most pure when we're showing everything we have.
I abide by a strict physical regiment that I came up with. It's hard to maintain, but I hope the results show.
I'm sure games like this are common in Mondstadt. I just never get invited...
My faith will never waver!
This should hold up...
I wonder if I'll ever be as tall as my big sister...
â™« Laa, la la la laaaa~ â™«
C'mon, we can do it!
If they were here, my fans would be cheering me on right now... I can't let them down!
My big sis-- Er, Master Jean and I recently explored a beautiful tropical island. I hope we go back sometime.
Hah... All this standing around is making me so sleepy...
No matter what may come, know that we're all in it together.
May the Anemo Archon continue to watch over me.
The concept of "idols" originated from a foreign land. In a way, I'm the ambassador of idols in Mondstadt.
An Archon's power is based on the control and worship they have over their people. In that sense, Barbatos is the weakest... but I think the freedom he allows us makes him the most noble.
I was told there would be lewd things happening here. I'm... not too versed in them, so...
If any of you get hurt, my Vision gives me the power to heal others. Don't be afraid to ask for help.
Lord Barbatos, lend me your strength.
Let the show begin!
I'm not so sure that this is what most people think of when they imagine "freedom..."
As Master Jean would say: "Let the wind lead."
I need to stay positive! An idol always has to wear a smile!
The Honorary Knight hails from another world, so I already knew of them. Still, to think they would convene at a place like this...
Barbatos, bless me with safe passage... and good fortune, if that's alright...
This is a different kind of performance from what I'm used to, but it's still been fun.
A thousand years ago, Barbatos descended to free Mondstadt from tyranny. I wish I could have been there to see it.
I usually only have this much fun during the Windblume Festival. Playing games with others is nice, isn't it?
Hah, hah... A-Apologies, the singing and dancing always leaves me a little exhausted...
It's good to experience new things, isn't it? That's why I hope to take a trip to the far-off island of Inazuma someday.
Whether it's compliments or criticism, I'll be sure to note everything anybody says about me in my journal.
Let's keep going, everybody! We'll finish this game no matter what!
I was thinking of accompanying the Traveller to pick up Wolfhook after this... I only hope I have enough energy left.
I've never put on a show like this before. It's not so bad, so long as it's in private...
My Vision wouldn't be of much help here. Perhaps if I learned divination, like that wandering astrologian...
I think a game like this is exactly what my older sis-- er, Master Jean needs. She's always so tense, what with leading the Knights of Favonius.
Even now, I'm doing my best. That's the least that both an idol and a Deaconess can do.
â™« Even if I reach my limit / Even when it's tough, I won't give up / I won't give in â™«
I'm here because I want to be here, nothing more. That, alone, is liberating.
I want to bring happiness to everybody in Mondstadt. I count as "everybody" too, don't I?
I'd love to visit Liyue and attend the Lantern Rite sometime. I wonder if anybody would recognize me...
My belief will never waver! But I do sometimes wonder if Barbatos is making fun of me when the wind blows up my skirt...
A win or a loss is okay with me, just so long as everybody is smiling in the end.
Everybody, make sure to get some rest after this. I know how... exhausting things like this can be.
I know many of my fans would like to see me like this. I-Is getting to see an idol in this state exciting for any of you?
I'm going to take a short rest. I'll need all the energy I can get for what comes later...
My faith in Barbatos will remain true... even if he doesn't seem to be smiling on me right now...
I don't think I can heal cards to make them better...
Well, if nothing else, I'll feel a little more free.
As that bard would say "Wan, wan, waaaan..."
Even if I lose this one, I'll get right up and ready for the next one!
I would cheer any of you on if you lost, so promise me you'd do the same, alright?
I hope to define what it means to be an idol. ...That's quite selfish of me, isn't it?
I wish I could get some advice on how to break through to a stubborn person. Why won't Sister Rosaria ever join us in prayer?
I could really use something spicy to calm my nerves right now...
My faith in Barbatos will never waver, but I wish, just once, I could see what he looks like.
Would you all join me in praying for Liyue's safety? I've heard it's been turbulent over there as of late.
â™« Hmm, hmm, hmm... â™« Oh no, I forgot all the words to the song!
Have I not been praying enough recently? Is that why I was dealt these?
What worth is an idol if I can't give anybody happiness that lasts? ...I'm sorry, that was a strange thing to ask.
O-Oh no! I'll just have to try twice as hard in the next round!
I accept that luck is impartial... and I also accept that it's natural to be annoyed with it sometimes...
A true test of belief...
It's a good thing I'm used to not being number one...
Another step in this other form of freedom approaches...
Not like this...
I...I won't give up!
â™« Hmm, hm hmmm hmm... â™« Ah, I'm sorry. I'm only trying to calm my nerves.
My fans wouldn't be happy if they knew I was at a place like this. Can we promise that this will stay between us?
I messed up pretty badly... Okay, enough feeling sorry for myself! I can only do that for 30 seconds at a time!
I'm happy to receive as much attention as I do, but... Is it rude to say that some people take it a little too far?
My big sister would never have messed up this badly...
The other nuns certainly wouldn't approve of this...
Surely, this is my retribution for letting the Holy Lyre be damaged. Barbatos, forgive me...
Just once, I wish I could give somebody a smile that doesn't fade so quickly.
Haaah... I-I can only dance for so long before I start getting worn out...
I've heard defeat tastes bitter... Oh, I hate bitter food...
No, Barbara, no...!
I can make others happy, but I can't make that happiness last...
I performed at the Angel's Share tavern, and Master Diluc was frowning the whole way through... Does he hate my singing that much...?
It's alright for me to let myself be sad. I have to remind myself of that.
Idols aren't perfect, even if some citizens don't realize that.
I can't stop my companions from getting injured, but I can at least heal the aftermath...
The final act is coming... O-Oh no, I didn't mean it like that!
I don't mind putting on a show for you all. Just, um... be gentle.
For once, I want to be the best at something. That's why I decided to become an idol.
I hope you all will cheer me on... When it comes down to it, your support would mean the world to me.
Are you watching right now, Barbatos? More importantly, are you laughing at me?
My fans always call for an encore after a show. I-I hope none of you are like them.
I want to be selfish, just this once. Are idols allowed to be selfish...?
If luck is controlled by an Archon, then please, be just a little gentler with me next round...!
M-Me? Well, I can patch you up if you're injured... and I'd sing for you everyday. O-oh, but of course, it's too early for me to be getting married...
A-A spouse? I'll always heal you if you get hurt, of course... and I can sing you a song while I'm doing it. B-But it's still too early to think about marriage, I think...
Are you in trouble financially, Reimu? The Church of Favonius is always happy to help those in need.
It sounds like you're having trouble financially, Reimu. Know that the Church of Favonius is always happy to help those who need it.
I know Master Jean can be strict, but I'm sure she knows you're improving every day, Noelle. You'll get there soon enough!
That would be wonderful, Noelle! Just make sure not to push yourself too hard, okay?
No, Noelle, thank you. It's only through your support that I've been able to come this far. I hope you'll keep supporting me in the future, too!
I always wear panties when I'm out in public, but truthfully, it's a little exciting to walk around without them on.
I don't see what's so wrong with having a little hair down there... In Mondstadt, we're all free to live as choose.
U-Umm, yes... A few times, with the same man... B-But please don't tell anybody!
Truthfully, I always thought I was only attracted to men. But as I've grown older, other women have become strangely alluring...
P-Please, don't even joke about that, Hu Tao! Just the thought is embarrassing!
It's a pleasure to meet all of you. I haven't quite had the opportunity for my daily prayer today, so perhaps you would be willing to join me?
Would any of you care to join me in my daily prayer? I know not everybody reveres Barbatos as much as I do, but it's always nice to have others join in.
That tune I was singing earlier... I've been trying to practice songs from other lands. I hope it didn't sound too strange.
Barbatos is the god I worship, yes, but I've never heard of this "Earth." I come from a world called Teyvat.
I'm not sure about this "Earth," Meia, but Barbatos is one of the gods of the world I'm from, Teyvat.
Ah, no. Most of my shows are conducted in Mondstadt. Still, Rex Lapis and his contracts are of great interest to me...
I'm afraid not, Hu Tao. I usually don't step foot outside of Mondstadt. Even so, I've done some studying on Rex Lapis...
The idol part of me isn't a lie, Hu Tao. B-But... I have my indulgences and desires too, just like everybody else.
The idol part of me is just as real as the rest of me, Hu Tao. Even so... I-I suppose even deaconesses have to indulge in sin sometimes.
Hydro is the element of healing. To heal all in Mondstadt and beyond is the mission Barbatos bestowed upon me.
Why, it's because Hydro is the element of healing. Barbatos gave me a holy mission to heal everybody in Teyvat.
Oh, is it me again? Ehehe, I don't mind. I still have my collar, after all.
It seems luck didn't favor me this round. Well, that's no trouble. I still have something small.
You're not wrong, Sucrose, but it's a little different for an idol. We have expectations placed on us, so it's harder to be honest...
For most people, that's true, Sucrose, but us idols have a lot of expectations placed on our shoulders...
I-I'm glad to have your support, Sucrose. Whatever happens, I hope you'll cheer for me till the end.
The same goes to you, Sucrose. I'm glad we could both be here to support each other.
Sucrose, are you saying... you don't know whether or not you can say how you really feel?
I worship the Anemo Archon, Fina. He's one of the Seven Archons of Teyvat, and the ruling Archon of Mondstadt. It's my role as Deaconess to lead the other nuns in worship to him.
Sinful as it may be, Barbatos doesn't care much for activities like this, Cynthia. He allows us to freedom to pursue whatever we wish.
T-This place is a little sinful, Cynthia, but Barbatos gives us the freedom to do as we like. A little prayer later and I'm sure all will be forgiven.
Why, to spread joy to all who may come here, of course! I want to bring my show beyond the walls of Mondstadt and to travelers near and far!
O-Oh my, so quickly? Very well. Ahem... To the wind that guides me: When I'm exhausted, bless me with the strength to keep going forward.
I hope it's not sacrilegious to do this now. Ahem... To the wind that guides me: When I'm exhausted, bless me with the strength to keep going forward.
I suppose now is as good a time as any. Ahem... To the wind that guides me: When I'm exhausted, bless me with the strength to keep going forward.
Okay, is everybody ready? Ahem... To the wind that guides me: When I'm exhausted, bless me with the strength to keep going forward.
It seems my time has come... Oh, I've yet to properly introduce myself, haven't I? Forgive my rudeness. I'm Barbara Pegg, the Deaconess of the Church of Favonius.
S-So the loss is mine... Oh, I still haven't introduced myself, have I? My apologies. Barbara Pegg, Deaconess of the Church of Favonius. Pleased to meet you all.
Ah, it seems the loss is mine... But I only just realized that I forgot a proper introduction. My apologies. My name is Barbara Pegg, and I'm the Deaconess of the Church of Favonius.
My collar is nothing interesting, so... perhaps you all would be more interested in learning about the Archons? They're the deities that watch over Teyvat.
While all the eyes are on me, could I interest you in history? Do all of you know what an Archon is? They're the seven elemental gods that watch over the denizens of Teyvat.
Since I have your attention, I'd like to explain what an Archon is. They're the elemental gods that rule over Teyvat from above, and there's seven of them - one for each nation.
Um, I... I have something of a confession to make. While I do want to heal each and every person who comes here... That wasn't my only goal.
I-I hate to admit it, but... I have a confession to make. I want to heal each and every person here... but that wasn't the only reason I came here.
Now that it's gotten this far, um... do you all mind if I tell you something? While I do want to heal all of you, that's not the only reason I came here.
O-Oh my... I got so caught up in explaining myself earlier, I hardly realized how exposed I am...
O-Oh, it's already down to this...? I got so caught up in talking earlier, I forgot how little I'm wearing under my dress!
I-I'm nearly out of things to strip already? ...Well, this isn't so bad.
It's... very much coming down to the wire, isn't it? Well, I knew what I signed up for...
This has been a very enriching experience thus far. T-Thank you, all of you.
I-It's already come down to this... I've only got my pantyhose left, so...
Barbatos forbid, this line shouldn't be playing!
Barbatos forbid, this line shouldn't be playing!
Barbatos forbid, this line shouldn't be playing!
When I'm uncertain, bless me with the wisdom to distinguish good from evil... (Hmm? Did Sucrose say something just now...?)
Wh-What?! U-Umm... Isn't it a little early for that...?!
H-Huh?! B-But... I've only just gotten to know you...!
I think you're right, Hu Tao... Now, if only everybody else could see it the same way.
Thank you, Hu Tao... It was starting to feel like I was the only one who felt this way.
You simply need to trust in Barbatos, Sucrose. As the Anemo Archon, I'm sure he gave you that Vision for a reason.
Barbatos's ways may seem strange, Sucrose, but they all have their reasons. I'm sure he bestowed you with an Anemo Vision for a purpose.
Oh, um... I could say the same for you, Sucrose. I-I never would've thought you were interested in this...
Truthfully, I could say the same for you, Sucrose. It was a bit of a shock to see you here, after all...
Thank you, Sucrose. Umm... I-If anybody from Mondstadt had to see me like this, I'm glad it was you.
Ehehe... You're too sweet, Sucrose. Out of anybody that could've played this game with me, I'm happy it was you.
I-I'm not sure what that means, Sucrose, but I hope it was a compliment.
I'm afraid I don't read as much as you do, Sucrose. I hope that was a compliment...
Well, as your friend... Feel free to look until you've proven your hypothesis.
When I'm uncertain, bless me with the wisdom to distinguish good from evil.
As Deaconess, it's my duty to lead the other nuns in prayer. We worship Barbatos, the Anemo Archon who watches over our home of Mondstadt.
As the Deaconess, part of my job is to lead our daily prayers. We give worship to Barbatos, the Anemo Archon of Mondstadt.
One of my duties as Deaconess is to lead the other nuns in prayer to Barbatos, the Anemo Archon. Barbatos, please watch over Mondstadt in my absence...
Barbatos is one of them and -- oh, I'm sorry, just let me undo this -- he commands the element of wind, or Anemo.
Barbatos is the Anemo Archon, meaning -- erm, I'm sorry, I just have to fiddle with this -- he controls wind.
I lay worship to the Anemo Archon, who -- oh, blasted collar, just come off already -- has control over wind, and watches over my home of Mondstadt.
I've always had an interest in things like this... s-sexual things. But my fans would be so let down if they knew I was doing things like this...
Idols have a culture of... "purity," I believe you'd call it. I've always wanted to explore things like this, but my fans would be so disappointed...
I love my fans with all my heart, but they can be a little... suffocating. And if they knew I were doing things like this, I can't imagine how they'd react...
Th-This bra is cute, isn't it? I almost thought that it's a shame nobody gets to see it... and now, you won't see it for the rest of the game.
I-I know I'm not as well-endowed as my sister or Master Lisa, but I hope you'll enjoy this nonetheless.
I-I know there are some people in Mondstadt who may like to see this, but this is an exclusive show just for all of you...
T-This is a special performance, just for all of you... One where Barbara bares it all. I hope you like it.
I-It feels so strange to do this in front of strangers... and it's even stranger that I'm enjoying it this much...
I came here to see others bare it all, but it seems I got even more than I bargained for... and I'm not complaining in the slightest.
M-My hat...
When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back... And, um, I think you're the one who's a little underdressed, Sucrose...!
When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back... And, um, Sucrose, I think you're the one who's a little flustering right now...!
O-Oh, umm... My apologies. I-I would be more than happy to discuss the Archons with you. (A-And that other proposition doesn't sound so bad either...)
O-Oh, I'm sorry. If it's a conversation about the Archons you'd like, I'd be more than happy to provide. (A-And maybe provide a little more, if that's what she wants...)
Umm... If I were being entirely truthful... This isn't the first time.
Well... If I were being totally honest with you... No, this isn't the first time.
When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back... Hmm? You look lost in thought, Sucrose. Is something the matter?
Not at all! To question Barbatos's whims is to come one step closer to understanding them.
It's not insensitive at all! Sometimes, I also question Barbatos's actions, but those questions always lead me to deeper understanding.
Ehehe, thank you. I hope you know the same is true for you too, Sucrose. I'm always happy to talk to you.
I'm happy to hear that, Sucrose. The same goes to you, you know. If you ever want to talk to me, I'm more than happy to discuss whatever you want. It's the least I can do.
O-Of course I don't walk around like this normally! But... i-it's a little exciting to try it sometimes, isn't it?
N-No, I never walk around like this normally. B-But the fear of getting caught makes it a little exciting, right?
Ehehe... Thank you, Sucrose. Or should I say... you're welcome...?
When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back... Well of course not, Fischl. Serving Barbatos is the highest calling I could ask for.

When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back... Certainly not, Fischl. My father trained me since I was very young, but even now, I never tire of carrying out Barbatos's will.
When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back... Oh, and Fischl... You shouldn't take everything Sister Rosaria says at face value.
When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back... Oh, um, Fischl... Please don't take everything Sister Rosaria says seriously.
A magazine from a foreign land! When Alice showed it to me, I was entranced by their intricate songs and dances!

Well, of course, Fischl. Nothing makes me happier than spreading joy. And it would make me even happier if you didn't talk about yourself like that. I love hearing you talk about what makes you happy.
When I suffer from injustice, bless me with the courage to fight back... Ehehe, thank you all for waiting. We can go back to the game now.
Of course, that's not all I do! I'm also an idol, spreading joy to Mondstadt and beyond! Maybe you've heard of me?
But of course, my duties extend beyond the Church! As an idol, it's my duty to bring happiness and healing to everyone in Teyvat - and everybody here, too!
Oh, but being a Deaconess isn't all I do! I bring joy and healing to all through the power of music. That's my duty as an idol!
Archons can also give "Visions" to those they deem worthy. This is mine - it allows me to heal the sick and injured with water.
Archons can also grant "Visions" to allow ordinary citizens to carry out their will. Barbatos blessed me with this Hydro Vision so I can heal those in need.
They can also grant magical powers called "Visions". Mine's right here in my book. Through it, I can heal injuries and sickness, so please let me know if you need any help.
So... I came here. A place where nobody knows who I am, and I can explore these things as much as I please. I hope that's not too much of a shock.
But then, I heard of a magical place where I could explore these things to my heart's content, and nobody in Mondstadt would be the wiser... I came here as soon as I could.
So I came to this place to explore that side of me, without anybody at home knowing about it... I hope you all can accept this side of me too.
...W-What do you think? One of my fans once said that my petiteness is one of my "charm points"...
What I lack in size, I hope I can make up for in energy. So let's keep this game going, everybody!
Ehehe... I've never shown them off like this before. I hope you all enjoy this just as much as a usual performance.
It seems there's not a lot of time left until the curtain call. Let's make the most of it together, shall we?
O-Oh, I suppose I still my hair ties left... But if I didn't have my hair up like this, would any of you even recognize me?
It feels... drafty. I-I'm not used to being exposed like this... What do you all think?
(Psst! ~Player~! You must have brought me to this table for a reason, right? Could it be you're looking for advice? Let's see...)
(Hey! ~Player~! I know you're not attracted to me, but I think I'm at this table for a reason. You want advice, right? Hmm...)
It's very nice to meet you, ~player~. May luck be with you in the further rounds
(~player~ hasn't said very much... Perhaps he speaks with actions instead of words?)
You remind of a traveler I met not too long ago, ~player~. On the quiet side, and you seem kind as well. The only difference is you don't have a floating friend that appears out of nowhere.
For some reason, I'm waiting for Paimon to appear and say something after ~player~ loses...
May the gods bless us both in the next round, ~player~.
You look like you know what you're doing, ~player~. However, it appears you'll need to take something off now.
C'mon, ~player~! If I can do it, you can too! (Though it might be easier for you.)
Forgive me, ~player~!
It's not as bad as it seems, ~player~.
I-I may have finished, but I think I want to see you lose more.
I may have lost, but you can still pull out a win, ~player~!
P-please take off something substantial, ~player~,
If it makes you feel better, I'd like to see you lose some more. (I feel as though I'll feel better from it, too.)
(~player~ will join me at this rate...)
I-I'll need you to embrace freedom with me, ~player~...I can't afford to lose again.
The gods have seen that I need to stay in...forgive me, ~player~.
I...I wouldn't say no to you losing a little more in particular, ~player~.
~player~ lost this time...but again, I feel both excited and sad that he did.

state.text: â™« Bring a mermaid in a dress of waves / To the other side of a shining bridge â™«

â™« Come aboard, and bring along / All your hopes and dreams â™«
â™« Clear as diamond, yet fragile as ice / My heart is racing â™«
â™« One path, one burden great / Yet ever do our aching souls point heavensward â™«
â™« Even if the sky burns out completely one day / Believe only in hope â™«
â™« Sing with me a song of birthrights and love / The light scatters to the sky above â™«
â™« Sing with me a song of conquest and fate / The black pillar cracks beneath its weight â™«
â™« Reach for my hand, I'll soar away / Into the dawn, oh, I wish I could stay â™«
â™« Words of this world will guide you homebound â™«

â™« I can't believe we've come so far / Happily ever after, here we are â™«

â™« Ain't nobody bringing us down / They could try, but we're gonna wear the crown â™«
â™« Heaven, please sing for me a song of life / Heaven, take me into your skies â™«
